input.sentences: it was a beautiful day to play a round of golf .
they remembered to wear hats as protection from the sun .
they were careful to keep score .
output.sentences: The friends decided to play a round of golf this weekend.
Everyone took care when teeing up for their turn.
Wearing sunscreen was a very important part of the day since most of the range is in the sun.
Getting the perfect shot is what golf is all about, that perfect line up could make or break the play.
In the end, adding up the score fairly and correctly is a huge responsibility, not to be taken lightly.
